verses.verse: וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh, now these שְׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> she-mOt Now these [are] the names בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> hab-ba-'Im which came מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> mitz-Ra-ye-mah; into Egypt אֵ֣ת <WH854> 'et with יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, with Jacob אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man וּבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> u-vei-To and his household בָּֽאוּ׃ <WH935> Ba-'u. came
רְאוּבֵ֣ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven Reuben שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on, Simeon לֵוִ֖י <WH3878> le-Vi Levi וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> vi-hu-Dah. and Judah
יִשָּׂשכָ֥ר <WH3485> yis-so-sh-Char Issachar זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun Zebulun וּבְנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> u-ve-ne-ya-Min and Benjamin
דָּ֥ן <WH1835> dan Dan וְנַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> ve-naf-ta-Li and Naphtali גָּ֥ד <WH1410> gad Gad וְאָשֵֽׁר׃ <WH836> ve-'a-Sher. and Asher

וַֽיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All נֶ֛פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh And all the souls יֹצְאֵ֥י <WH3318> yo-tze-'Ei that came out יֶֽרֶךְ־ <WH3409> ye-rech- of the loins יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> shiv-'Im were seventy נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> Na-fesh; souls וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> ve-yo-Sef for Joseph הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah was in בְמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> ve-mitz-Ra-yim. was in Egypt

וַיָּ֤מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> yo-Sef And Joseph וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> 'e-Chav, and all his brethren וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> ve-Chol and all הַדּ֥וֹר <WH1755> had-Dor and all that generation הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> ha-Hu. he

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel פָּר֧וּ <WH6509> pa-Ru were fruitful וַֽיִּשְׁרְצ֛וּ <WH8317> vai-yish-re-Tzu and increased abundantly וַיִּרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> vai-yir-Bu and multiplied וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <WH6105> vai-ya-'atz-Mu mighty בִּמְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> bim-'Od exceedingly מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; exceedingly וַתִּמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> vat-tim-ma-Le was filled הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz and the land אֹתָֽם׃ <WH854> 'o-Tam. for פ Peh

וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom Now there arose up מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king חָדָ֖שׁ <WH2319> cha-Dash a new עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; over Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> ya-Da' which knew אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> yo-Sef. not Joseph

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to his עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo; unto his people הִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> hin-Neh, Behold עַ֚ם <WH5971> 'am Behold the people בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel רַ֥ב <WH7227> rav [are] more וְעָצ֖וּם <WH6099> ve-'a-Tzum and mightier מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu. than

הָ֥בָה <WH3051> Ha-vah Come on נִֽתְחַכְּמָ֖ה <WH2449> nit-chak-ke-Mah let us deal wisely ל֑וֹ lo; פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- or יִרְבֶּ֗ה <WH7235> yir-Beh, with them lest they multiply וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for תִקְרֶ֤אנָה <WH7122> tik-Re-nah and it come to pass that when there falleth out מִלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah any war וְנוֹסַ֤ף <WH3254> ve-no-Saf join גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- will also הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu they עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and שֹׂ֣נְאֵ֔ינוּ <WH8130> so-ne-'Ei-nu, also unto our enemies וְנִלְחַם־ <WH3898> ve-nil-cham- and fight בָּ֖נוּ Ba-nu וְעָלָ֥ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah against us and [so] get them up מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. out of the land

וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> vai-ya-Si-mu Therefore they did set עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lav over שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> sa-Rei captain מִסִּ֔ים <WH4522> mis-Sim, discomfited לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because of עַנֹּת֖וֹ <WH6031> an-no-To to afflict בְּסִבְלֹתָ֑ם <WH5450> be-siv-lo-Tam; them with their burdens וַיִּ֜בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven And they built עָרֵ֤י <WH5892> 'a-Rei cities מִסְכְּנוֹת֙ <WH4543> mis-ke-nOt treasure לְפַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> le-far-'Oh, for Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פִּתֹ֖ם <WH6619> pi-Tom Pithom וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et רַעַמְסֵֽס׃ <WH7486> ra-'am-Ses. and Raamses

וְכַאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ve-cha-'a-Sher they יְעַנּ֣וּ <WH6031> ye-'an-Nu But the more they afflicted אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken them the more יִרְבֶּ֖ה <WH7235> yir-Beh they multiplied וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> ve-Chen and the more יִפְרֹ֑ץ <WH6555> yif-Rotz; and grew וַיָּקֻ֕צוּ <WH6973> vai-ya-Ku-tzu And they were grieved מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei because בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיַּעֲבִ֧דוּ <WH5647> vai-ya-'a-Vi-du to serve מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4713> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH6531> be-Fa-rech. with rigour

וַיְמָרְר֨וּ <WH4843> vay-ma-re-Ru bitter אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חַיֵּיהֶ֜ם <WH2416> chai-yei-Hem their lives בַּעֲבֹדָ֣ה <WH5656> ba-'a-vo-Dah bondage קָשָׁ֗ה <WH7186> ka-Shah, with hard בְּחֹ֙מֶר֙ <WH2563> be-Cho-mer in morter וּבִלְבֵנִ֔ים <WH3843> u-vil-ve-Nim, and in brick וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> 'a-vo-Dah and in all manner of service בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh; in the field אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֲבֹ֣דָתָ֔ם <WH5656> 'a-Vo-da-Tam, all their service אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עָבְד֥וּ <WH5647> 'a-ve-Du wherein they made them serve בָהֶ֖ם va-Hem בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH6531> be-Fa-rech. [was] with rigour

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <WH3205> lam-yal-le-Dot midwives הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <WH5680> ha-'iv-ri-Yot; to the Hebrew אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher of whom שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> shem of which the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <WH259> ha-'a-Chat of the one שִׁפְרָ֔ה <WH8236> shif-Rah, [was] Shiphrah וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> ve-Shem and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> hash-she-Nit of the other פּוּעָֽה׃ <WH6326> pu-'Ah. Puah

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, And he said בְּיַלֶּדְכֶן֙ <WH3205> be-yal-led-Chen When ye do the office of a midwife אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָֽעִבְרִיּ֔וֹת <WH5680> ha-'iv-ri-Yot, to the Hebrew women וּרְאִיתֶ֖ן <WH7200> u-re-'i-Ten and see עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon הָאָבְנָ֑יִם <WH70> ha-'a-ve-Na-yim; [them] upon the stools אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> ben if it [be] a son הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu you וַהֲמִתֶּ֣ן <WH4191> va-ha-mit-Ten then ye shall kill אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if בַּ֥ת <WH1323> bat him but if it [be] a daughter הִ֖יא <WH1931> hi she וָחָֽיָה׃ <WH2425> va-Cha-yah. then she shall live

וַתִּירֶ֤אןָ <WH3372> vat-ti-Re-na feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <WH3205> ham-yal-le-Dot But the midwives אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, God וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and did not עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su, and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber commanded אֲלֵיהֶ֖ן <WH413> 'a-lei-Hen as מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech not as the king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ <WH2421> vat-te-chai-Yei-na alive אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיְלָדִֽים׃ <WH3206> hay-la-Dim. the men children

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- And the king מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֔ת <WH3205> lam-yal-le-Dot, for the midwives וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said לָהֶ֔ן la-Hen, מַדּ֥וּעַ <WH4069> mad-Du-a' unto them Why עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ן <WH6213> 'a-si-Ten have ye done הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> had-da-Var this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; this וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ <WH2421> vat-te-chai-Yei-na alive אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיְלָדִֽים׃ <WH3206> hay-la-Dim. the men children

וַתֹּאמַ֤רְןָ <WH559> vat-to-Mar-na said הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <WH3205> ham-yal-le-Dot And the midwives אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, unto Pharaoh כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki Because לֹ֧א <WH3808> lo not כַנָּשִׁ֛ים <WH802> chan-na-Shim women הַמִּצְרִיֹּ֖ת <WH4713> ham-mitz-ri-Yot [are] not as the Egyptian women הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <WH5680> ha-'iv-ri-Yot; Because the Hebrew כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because חָי֣וֹת <WH2422> cha-Yot for they [are] lively הֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> Hen-nah, in בְּטֶ֨רֶם <WH2962> be-Te-rem ere תָּב֧וֹא <WH935> ta-Vo come in אֲלֵהֶ֛ן <WH413> 'a-le-Hen and הַמְיַלֶּ֖דֶת <WH3205> ham-yal-Le-det and are delivered וְיָלָֽדוּ׃ <WH3205> ve-ya-La-du. the midwives

וַיֵּ֥יטֶב <WH3190> vai-Yei-tev dealt well אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him Therefore God לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֑ת <WH3205> lam-yal-le-Dot; with the midwives וַיִּ֧רֶב <WH7235> vai-Yi-rev multiplied הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and the people וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <WH6105> vai-ya-'atz-Mu mighty מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. and waxed very

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> vay-Hi become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because יָֽרְא֥וּ <WH3372> ya-re-'U feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <WH3205> ham-yal-le-Dot And it came to pass because the midwives אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; God וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as that he made לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem בָּתִּֽים׃ <WH1004> bat-Tim. them houses

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> vay-Tzav charged פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo all his people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- Every הַבֵּ֣ן <WH1121> hab-Ben Every son הַיִּלּ֗וֹד <WH3209> hai-yil-Lod, that is born הַיְאֹ֙רָה֙ <WH2975> hay-'O-rah into the river תַּשְׁלִיכֻ֔הוּ <WH7993> tash-li-Chu-hu, ye shall cast וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and every הַבַּ֖ת <WH1323> hab-Bat and every daughter תְּחַיּֽוּן׃ <WH2421> te-chai-Yun. ye shall save alive ס sa-Mek
